query.statement: INSERT INTO SAPHEE.ZWBMESG( MANDT , MESGSEND , MESGNUMB , MESGACCP , MESGTITL , MESGDESC , MESGCHEK , MESGDATE , MESGTIME , MESGFNAM , MESGFSIZ , MESGACDE , MESGSEDE , MESGACTM ) VALUES ( #G_MANDT# , #ds_master.MESGSEND# , #ds_key.MAX_SEQ# , #MESGACCP# , #ds_master.MESGTITL# --, #ds_master.MESGDESC# ,CAST(#ds_master.MESGDESC# AS VARCHAR(500)) , 'N' , SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),1,8) , SUBSTR(SAPHEE.TO_DATETIME(),9,6) , #ds_master.MESGFNAM# , #ds_master.MESGFSIZ# , 'N' , 'N' , '' )
